ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 9 items, Camera & lens includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with HD Movie Mode (Body Only, does not include a lens)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional LP-E10 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Fast Access Carrying Case with Pockets & Neck Strap
5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging (Body) + 8pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
